channel.title: Posts on Alex Kiefer's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Alex Kiefer's Notebook

item.title: The Beginning
item.description: The Beginning This is the first of, hopefully, a number of posts on this website to track the things going on in my academic, professional, and personal life. My intent with this website it to serve and a means of improving my understanding of various technologies, algorithms, etc by writing about them, as well as my writing and research skills. I will aim to keep this blog semi-professional, as I want it to be something that doesn’t blacklist me from the industry, but still something that I enjoy writing.
